Comments_List: Improved my ability to read and translate classical Arabic texts; improved my understanding of Arabic grammar; expanded my Arabic vocabulary.
I learned how to approach a text in Classical Arabic, which is not taught in any other class at Yale.
The instructor taught grammar very well and most of all explained how to approach medieval Arabic texts.
Yes.  Great course for anyone wanting to learn to read classical Arab texts.
Yes. This is among the only courses at Yale that really focuses upon Classical Arabic texts, and Adeel does an excellent job at introducing students to a variety of genres of Classical Arabic texts.
